languages.text: {n}Вам знакомы импланты вроде того, что заменил Джай шею — это лишь часть массивной аугментики, подменяющей внутренние органы. Перерезанное горло никак не могло стать причиной для установки столь сложного устройства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вам знакомы импланты вроде того, что заменил Джай шею — это лишь часть массивной аугментики, подменяющей внутренние органы. Перерезанное горло никак не могло стать причиной для установки столь сложного устройства.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}You are familiar with implants like the one that has replaced Jae's neck — it is merely one part of a massive augmentation replacing the internal organs. A slit throat could not have been the cause for installing such a sophisticated device.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You are familiar with implants like the one that has replaced Jae's neck — it is merely one part of a massive augmentation replacing the internal organs. A slit throat could not have been the cause for installing such a sophisticated device.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}你对植入物很熟悉，也很清楚取代了婕伊的脖子的植入物是做什么用的。她的脖子只是整个系统的一部分，这个大型系统用来取代内部器官，强化身体的力量。如果仅仅是被割了喉，不可能需要安装如此复杂的装置。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are familiar with implants like the one that has replaced Jae's neck — it is merely one part of a massive augmentation replacing the internal organs. A slit throat could not have been the cause for installing such a sophisticated device.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你对植入物很熟悉，也很清楚取代了婕伊的脖子的植入物是做什么用的。她的脖子只是整个系统的一部分，这个大型系统用来取代内部器官，强化身体的力量。如果仅仅是被割了喉，不可能需要安装如此复杂的装置。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Has visto muchos implantes como el que reemplaza el cuello de Jae: es solo una parte de un inmenso aumento que sustituye sus órganos internos. Es imposible que le hayan instalado un dispositivo tan sofisticado por un tajo en la garganta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are familiar with implants like the one that has replaced Jae's neck — it is merely one part of a massive augmentation replacing the internal organs. A slit throat could not have been the cause for installing such a sophisticated device.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Has visto muchos implantes como el que reemplaza el cuello de Jae: es solo una parte de un inmenso aumento que sustituye sus órganos internos. Es imposible que le hayan instalado un dispositivo tan sofisticado por un tajo en la garganta.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイの首の代わりとなったインプラントのようなものは、あなたには馴染みがあった…それは、内臓に代わる大規模は補強の一部に過ぎない。喉を切り裂かれたからと言って、このような精巧な装置を取り付けることはできない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are familiar with implants like the one that has replaced Jae's neck — it is merely one part of a massive augmentation replacing the internal organs. A slit throat could not have been the cause for installing such a sophisticated device.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの首の代わりとなったインプラントのようなものは、あなたには馴染みがあった…それは、内臓に代わる大規模は補強の一部に過ぎない。喉を切り裂かれたからと言って、このような精巧な装置を取り付けることはできない。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du kennst Implantate wie jenes, das Jaes Hals ersetzt hat. Es ist lediglich ein Teil einer gewaltigen Augmentation, die alle inneren Organe setzt. Eine aufgeschlitzte Kehle kann nicht der Grund für die Installation eines solch komplexen Geräts gewesen sein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are familiar with implants like the one that has replaced Jae's neck — it is merely one part of a massive augmentation replacing the internal organs. A slit throat could not have been the cause for installing such a sophisticated device.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du kennst Implantate wie jenes, das Jaes Hals ersetzt hat. Es ist lediglich ein Teil einer gewaltigen Augmentation, die alle inneren Organe setzt. Eine aufgeschlitzte Kehle kann nicht der Grund für die Installation eines solch komplexen Geräts gewesen sein.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous connaissez bien les implants comme celui que Jae porte à la place de son cou : ce n'est qu'une partie d'une énorme augmentation qui remplace les organes internes. Un simple égorgement n'aurait pas entraîné la pose d'un appareil aussi sophistiqué.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are familiar with implants like the one that has replaced Jae's neck — it is merely one part of a massive augmentation replacing the internal organs. A slit throat could not have been the cause for installing such a sophisticated device.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous connaissez bien les implants comme celui que Jae porte à la place de son cou : ce n'est qu'une partie d'une énorme augmentation qui remplace les organes internes. Un simple égorgement n'aurait pas entraîné la pose d'un appareil aussi sophistiqué.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın boynunun yerine geçen bu tip implantlara aşinasın. Bu gördüğün, iç organların yerini alan devasa bir ogmentasyonun bir parçası yalnızca. Böylesi sofistike bir cihazın kurulma sebebi, boğazın kesilmesi olamaz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are familiar with implants like the one that has replaced Jae's neck — it is merely one part of a massive augmentation replacing the internal organs. A slit throat could not have been the cause for installing such a sophisticated device.{/n}
